title: pUjai sheiguvOm
sahitya:
pUjai sheiguvOm Om shakti 


caraNam 1    dEsurum arattai Ishanum ughandE mAsarak-kAttiDum kAshinik-annaiyai
    caraNam 2    vAnavarum tava jnAniyarum yOga mAniyarum vEdagAnam muzhangiDa
    caraNam 3    nandEshattiru nandALoLiravE cintaiyil Anandam tandiDum shaktiyai
    caraNam 4    bandhamil Atma shakti vaLarndiDa mantiram vandE mAtaram enavE
    caraNam 5    mAnil vaLamum dAnamum selvamum mAniDa dharmamum mangaLamAgavE
